home.endlessSolutionsDescription: We offer a range of specialized services designed for large-scale clients, from strategic consulting to tailored growth solutions, enhancing the value and impact of your business.
home.customApplicationDescription: Build your vision into a powerful, tailored application with our expert team, aligned precisely with your goals for excellence at every step.

ourWork.title: Our Work
ourWork.description: Our offerings encompass services that serve as startup mentoring or include consulting, contributing to the enhanced value proposition of your business.

project2.details: DApp and Wallet Development for Blockchain Solutions

project4.details: Bdtronic | Custom-Made CRM System Developed by Protecht.ch

team.description: Our close-knit team is built on trust, collaboration, and shared goals. We support each other through challenges, value open communication, and celebrate each other's successes. This unity creates an environment where everyone feels empowered to contribute their best, knowing they are part of a supportive and dedicated team committed to achieving common goals. This dynamic approach keeps us motivated, helping us grow stronger both as individuals and as a team.

communication.description: We believe in maintaining transparent, open communication across all interactions with our partners to foster a collaborative and aligned environment. Our approach prioritizes clear, constructive feedback and an open exchange of perspectives, allowing us to adapt flexibly to our partners' needs and industry innovations. By valuing their insights and working together closely, we align our goals more effectively, solve challenges, and build strong, trusting relationships that drive mutual success.

solution.description: Our core focus revolves around finding innovative and effective solutions, tackling each challenge with a collaborative spirit. Our team takes pride in a proactive approach, working together to anticipate needs, identify root causes, and develop practical strategies that lead to lasting results. With a solution-oriented mindset, we don't just address immediate concerns; we work to prevent future issues, looking at the bigger picture to implement sustainable practices.

quality.description: Our focus is on finding solutions and overcoming challenges together. We are proactive in identifying issues and take pride in resolving them efficiently and effectively. Quality is our priority in every aspect of our work. We strive for excellence and continuous improvement to deliver the best outcomes for our clients and stakeholders. Every team member is dedicated to upholding the highest standards, ensuring that each project reflects our commitment to precision and care.

testimonial_1.name: Bujar Demolli
testimonial_1.title: CEO Dreilinden
testimonial_1.text: Protecht has been a key partner in our digital transformation journey. Their expertise ensures our security and keeps us resilient in the fast-evolving digital landscape. With Protecht, we're prepared to face the challenges of today’s digital world.

testimonial_2.name: Yvonne Lang
testimonial_2.title: COO LFT
testimonial_2.text: The programming and IT security implemented by Protecht have significantly enhanced our daily operations. Thanks to their expertise, we’ve been upgraded to state-of-the-art technology, which has been a profound success in our work and overall journey.

testimonial_3.name: Arber Arifi
testimonial_3.title: Chairman of the Board reYa
testimonial_3.text: Protecht's expertise in AI and Cloud has been pivotal in transforming our datacenter into a green, AI-driven powerhouse. Their skills and dedication have been key to the success of our reYa cloud and AI datacenter, enabling us to meet the evolving challenges of modern technology.

testimonial_4.name: Julian Richter - Founder & Managing Wirk Partner
testimonial_4.title: Founder & Managing Wirk Partner
testimonial_4.text: The Learning Circle by Protecht offers personalized one-on-one learning support for middle school students, helping them excel academically and grow personally. It has assisted over 300 students with nearly 5,000 sessions.

hero.subHeading: Innovating without limits, empowering your vision

about.heading: About us
about.text1: Protecht was created in Zug, Switzerland, to facilitate international collaboration among Switzerland, Germany, Austria, and Kosovo. With offices in Zug, Zurich, Vienna, Frankfurt, and Prishtina, Protecht is strategically positioned to foster innovation across the DACH and Balkan regions.
about.text2: Specializing in emerging technologies, Protecht focuses on AI solutions and infrastructure, blockchain, and cloud solutions. Our mission is to empower businesses to harness advanced technology for sustainable growth and digital transformation.

muhamer.name: Muhamer Nuridini
muhamer.title: CEO
muhamer.description1: As Founder and CEO of Protecht, Muhamer Nuridini leads with 16+ years of expertise in IT, software development, and system administration.
muhamer.description2: He drives Protecht’s mission to empower businesses through digital transformation with solutions in Custom Applications, Blockchain, AI, Cloud, Fintech, and ICT Consulting.
muhamer.description3: Focused on delivering tailored strategies, Muhamer fosters long-term client partnerships built on trust and innovation, providing the tools and insights necessary for sustained growth and digital excellence.

bujar.name: Bujar Demolli
bujar.title: Advisor to the Board at Protecht
bujar.description1: With over 20 years of experience, Bujar Demolli brings visionary insights and a strategic mindset to his role as Advisor to the Board at Protecht.
bujar.description2: Renowned for his expertise in technology-driven initiatives, Bujar has a deep understanding of the DACH region and a proven track record in B2B markets.
bujar.description3: As an advisor, Bujar plays a key role in guiding Protecht’s expansion, ensuring the company remains at the forefront of digital transformation and value-driven strategies for its clients.

footer.description: We bring your boldest ideas to life with creativity, expertise, and strategic insight. Let’s work together to turn your vision into reality and make a lasting impact.
footer.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest Protecht news

hero.heading: Services
hero.mainHeading: Your Creative Journey Starts Here. Our Comprehensive Services
hero.subHeading: Where Potential Meets Possibility: Cultivating Growth Through Innovative Solutions

section01.title: Custom Made Application
section01.description: Our custom applications are meticulously designed to align with your unique business needs and objectives. By working closely with you, our dedicated team ensures every detail is tailored to enhance functionality, efficiency, and user experience. We leverage industry-leading technology and development practices to bring your vision to life with precision and uncompromising quality.

section02.title: Blockchain Development
section02.description: Empower your business with tailored blockchain solutions that deliver unparalleled security, transparency, and operational efficiency. Our blockchain applications are designed to foster trust and enhance agility across various industries, from finance and supply chain to healthcare and logistics. By implementing decentralized technology, we enable secure transactions, streamlined processes, and real-time data sharing that redefine how you conduct business in the digital age.

section03.title: AI Cloud Solutions
section03.description: Unlock the potential of AI-driven cloud solutions to transform your business. Our intelligent cloud infrastructure automates complex processes, extracts actionable insights from vast data, and enhances decision-making capabilities. Designed to scale with your needs, our AI cloud solutions empower you to make smarter, data-driven decisions, optimize performance, and drive impactful results across all facets of your organization.

section04.title: AI Cloud Infrastructure
section04.description: Leverage high-performance AI cloud infrastructure powered by GPU-accelerated computing to unlock advanced machine learning and deep learning capabilities. Our infrastructure combines scalable cloud resources with cutting-edge GPUs, optimized for handling large datasets, training complex models, and supporting real-time AI workloads. Designed for computational efficiency, it empowers businesses to run resource-intensive AI applications seamlessly, enabling faster processing speeds, enhanced data analytics, and accelerated model deployment.

section05.title: Cloud Solution and Hosting
section05.description: Ensure a resilient and optimized IT infrastructure with our comprehensive network and system administration services. Our team provides proactive monitoring, rapid issue resolution, and continuous performance tuning to keep your operations running seamlessly. From configuring secure networks to maintaining system stability, we work to minimize disruptions, enhance reliability, and support your business’s evolving needs, ensuring your IT environment is robust, efficient, and secure.

section06.title: Fintech
section06.description: Drive innovation in finance with cutting-edge fintech solutions designed to optimize operational efficiency, enhance security, and ensure regulatory compliance. Our expertise in financial technology empowers your business to deliver seamless digital experiences, process transactions securely, and manage data with precision. With scalable and robust software tailored for the fast-evolving financial sector, we help you stay competitive, adapt to industry shifts, and meet customer demands with confidence.

section07.title: SAP/ERP
section07.description: Revolutionize your organization with ERP solutions that prioritize SAP but extend to a variety of platforms, providing a robust foundation for enterprise-wide integration and efficiency. Our offerings leverage SAP’s comprehensive capabilities—from finance and supply chain to human resources—while supporting other ERP systems to ensure seamless data flow and process automation across departments. Designed to enhance transparency, our ERP solutions empower businesses with real-time analytics, enabling leaders to make data-driven decisions and adapt swiftly to market demands.

section08.title: IT Support
section08.description: Our IT support services are dedicated to maintaining a stable, secure, and resilient IT infrastructure that supports your business goals. From rapid troubleshooting and proactive monitoring to comprehensive maintenance, we ensure your systems operate at peak performance with minimal downtime. Our team works closely with you to identify and address potential issues before they impact productivity, empowering your business with reliable and responsive IT support that adapts to evolving needs.

section09.title: Network and System Administration
section09.description: Ensure a resilient and optimized IT infrastructure with our comprehensive network and system administration services. Our team provides proactive monitoring, rapid issue resolution, and continuous performance tuning to keep your operations running seamlessly. From configuring secure networks to maintaining system stability, we work to minimize disruptions, enhance reliability, and support your business’s evolving needs, ensuring your IT environment is robust, efficient, and secure.

section10.title: Consulting
section10.description: Our IT consulting services empower your business to leverage emerging technologies for competitive advantage. We provide expert guidance on cloud solutions, AI integration, cybersecurity, and digital transformation strategies tailored to your unique needs. By identifying technology-driven growth opportunities and implementing scalable solutions, we help you optimize operations, enhance security, and stay ahead in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.

hero.heading: Our Benefits
hero.mainHeading: Our benefits cater to your convenience.
hero.subHeading: Innovating without limits, empowering your vision

section01.title: Discovering Smart Management
section01.description: Stay on top of your tasks and stay informed about what's happening.
section01.content1: Empower your organization with advanced management tools designed to enhance visibility, control, and decision-making.
section01.content2: Our smart management solutions keep you fully informed of key metrics and operational insights, allowing you to proactively address challenges before they arise.
section01.content3: Stay in sync with all aspects of your business, optimize workflow efficiency, and improve strategic alignment across teams.
section01.content4: Gain real-time insights across all projects, empowering you to make strategic, proactive decisions that fuel long-term success and continuous improvement.

section02.title: Customized Software Development
section02.description: Custom software development is the process of conceptualizing, designing.
section02.content1: Experience the power of software that’s built precisely to meet your business needs.
section02.content2: Our customized development services take you through a comprehensive process, from conceptualization to deployment, ensuring that every aspect of the solution aligns with your goals.
section02.content3: With a deep focus on usability, scalability, and integration, we create applications that seamlessly blend into your existing infrastructure while enhancing your competitive edge.
section02.content4: Whether you need to streamline operations, automate repetitive tasks, or support unique business functions, our tailored software adapts to grow with you.

section03.title: Effortless Rapid Communication
section03.description: Effortlessly manage your task lists and stay connected with real-time updates.
section03.content1: Enhance team productivity and keep everyone connected with our rapid communication tools.
section03.content2: Designed to facilitate seamless interaction, our solutions ensure that essential information flows quickly across departments, minimizing delays and fostering real-time collaboration.
section03.content3: Whether your teams are on-site or remote, they can stay aligned on tasks, updates, and projects without the hurdles of outdated communication systems.
section03.content4: Keep projects moving forward efficiently, reduce miscommunication, and foster an environment where collaboration and transparency thrive.

section04.title: Stay Ahead with Adaptive Capabilities
section04.description: Stay organized with your task lists and remain updated on the latest development.
section04.content1: In a constantly evolving market, adaptability is key to staying competitive.
section04.content2: Our adaptive solutions help your business stay agile, resilient, and prepared for industry shifts.
section04.content3: With tools designed to support ongoing innovation and responsiveness, you can quickly pivot strategies, maintain alignment with market demands, and ensure operational continuity.
section04.content4: By maintaining a proactive approach to organizational growth, we enable you to not only react to changes but also anticipate and leverage them to your advantage, keeping you one step ahead in your industry.

contactPage.title: We would love to hear from you.
contactPage.description: For inquiries or further assistance, please contact us via our website or directly via email or phone.

hero.heading: Terms and Conditions
hero.subHeading: Innovating without limits, empowering your vision

introduction.message: Welcome to Protecht. By accessing or using our services, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined below. Please read them carefully.

content.protecht: Refers to our company, offering IT solutions including Custom-Made Applications, Blockchain Development, AI Solutions, Cloud Services, IT Support, and Consulting.
content.services: All products, services, and solutions provided by Protecht.
content.user: Any individual or entity accessing or using our services.

02.title: Acceptance of Terms
02.content: By using our website or services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms. If you do not agree, do not use our services.

03.title: Services Offered
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) cloud and on-premise development
03.note: Specific details and terms for each service will be outlined in the respective service agreements.

04.title: User Obligations
content: Provide accurate and up-to-date information when required.
Use our services in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
Refrain from using our services to engage in illegal, harmful, or unethical activities.

05.title: Intellectual Property
05.content: All content, trademarks, logos, and software used by Protecht are the property of the company or its licensors. You are prohibited from copying, distributing, or modifying these without prior written consent.

06.title: Confidentiality
06.content: Any sensitive information shared between you and Protecht shall remain confidential unless otherwise agreed in writing or required by law.

07.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

hero.heading: Privacy
hero.subHeading: Innovating without limits, empowering your vision

policyHeader.title: Privacy Policy
policyHeader.intro: Protecht is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you interact with our services.

01.title: Information We Collect
01.intro: We collect personal and non-personal information to provide, improve, and personalize our services. This may include:
points: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, business information, and payment details when provided.
Usage Data: Information about your interactions with our website, such as IP address, browser type, and pages visited.
Cookies: Small files stored on your device to enhance your browsing experience.

02.title: How We Use Your Information
02.intro: The information we collect is used for:
points: Responding to inquiries and offering support.
Analyzing usage trends to improve services.
Complying with legal and regulatory requirements.

03.title: Sharing Your Information
03.intro: We do not sell your personal information. However, we may share your data with:
points: Service Providers: Trusted partners who assist in delivering our services, bound by confidentiality agreements.
Legal Authorities: If required to comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.
Business Transfers: In case of mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction.

04.title: Data Security
04.content: Protecht implements industry-standard measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission or storage is entirely secure.

05.title: Your Rights
05.intro: As a user, you have the right to:
points: Access the personal data we hold about you.
Request corrections or updates to your information.
Delete your data, subject to legal and contractual obligations.
05.note: To exercise these rights, contact us using the details provided below.

06.title: Cookies and Tracking
06.content: Protecht uses cookies to enhance user experience. You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect your access to certain features.

07.title: Third-Party Links
07.content: Our website may contain links to external sites. Protecht is not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties.

08.title: Children’s Privacy
08.content: Protecht’s services are not directed at children under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

09.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
09.content: Protecht reserves the right to update this policy. Significant changes will be communicated through our website or other channels. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

10.title: 10. Contact Us
10.content: If you have questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us:
10.footer: Protecht: Your Partner in IT Excellence
